title: Predict H1N1 and Seasonal Flu Vaccines
description: Predict whether people received H1N1 and seasonal flu vaccines using information they shared about their backgrounds, opinions, and health behaviors, using DrivenData datasets and using various models.

title: Stock Price Prediction using PySpark and Yahoo API
description:
The PySpark process is divided into two parts, the sender and the receiver, they use sockets to communicate. The sender fetches stock data from the Yahoo Finance API and preprocess it. On
 the receiver side, it processes the data in batches to predict stock prices using Linear Regression and Neural Networks. The system handles large-scale data processing and prediction, enabling effective stock price forecasting.

title: Personal Book Recommendations System
description: A personalized recommendation system that uses my reading preferences and history to suggest me books.

title: French Book Data Collection Process
description: Pipeline to scrape web page and collect data about French books. The datasets was stored in a csv file with more than 50,000 books

title: Automated Summarization of Long Documents
description: Developing and evaluating automated summarization models to effectively summarize long documents. The best model combines traditional and advanced Transformer-based approaches.
